text: Sir Frederick Gowland Hopkins OM FRS (20 June 1861 â€“ 16 May 1947) was an English chemist. He won the 1929 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, along with Christiaan Eijkman, for the discovery of vitamins. == References == Category:1861 births Category:1947 deaths Category:English chemists Category:Order of Merit Category:Knights Bachelor Category:Fellows of the Royal Society Category:Presidents of the Royal Society Category:Alumni of University College London Category:British Nobel Prize winners
